name: Swartz Home Group
description: A welcoming mid-week group focused on fellowship, prayer, and studying God's Word together in the Swartz home.

name: McCarthy Fellowship
description: A warm Thursday evening gathering for prayer, Bible discussion, and building community in the McCarthy home.

name: Boyette Road Group
description: A neighborhood group meeting in the Boyette Springs community room for Bible study and mutual encouragement.

name: South Shore Community Group
description: A community-focused group meeting at the South Shore Library, open to newcomers and visitors.

name: Evening Grace Group
description: A Monday evening group centered on grace-filled conversations, prayer, and studying the Scriptures together.

name: Brandon Bible Study
description: A Thursday evening Bible study meeting at the Brandon Community Center, focused on in-depth Scripture exploration.
